page.description: Fires while the files stored in the Application Cache are being downloaded. Allows you to display a progress message to the user.
page.discussion: Fires each time a file in the cache is downloaded. Use this event to display progress. Your code can reference the following variables:

item.name: e.event.loaded
item.description: The number of files that have been loaded.

item.name: e.event.total
item.description: The total number of files in the cache.

section.note: This event is not supported on Firefox. Firefox does not return the e.event.loaded or e.event.total variable.

section.title: Example
section.note: To use this example in your own UX Component, you must add a div with the ID *[js:APPCACHE_DOWNLOAD_PROGRESS]* to the component. This can be done using the Static Text control. The Static Text control can be found in the *[ui:Other Controls]* section.
